author: elecharny
msg: o Added a reset() method to clear up the number of added entries
o Added a test that stop and restart the consumer

author: amc
msg: IPv6 updates - replaced IpLookup with IpMap, changed some uses of ip_addr_t to in_addr_t

author: ggregory
msg: Javadoc: Invalid URL reference. Double quote the reference or use the href syntax line 50

author: arkurth
msg: Fixed problem in VMware.pm::capture subroutine. If a separate location is used to store the persistent vmdk (virtualdiskpath), the vmdk was simply renamed in that datastore during capture rather than being moved to the datastorepath datastore.

Fixed problem with get_image_size_bytes that occurred during capture if virtualdiskpath is being used. It was looking for the vmdk in the virtualdiskpath location after the vmdk was moved to the datastorepath location.
Renamed the rename_vmdk subroutine to move_vmdk.
